content: snowy mountain pattern by ekaterina vorobeva @thiscosynest about the pattern materials any dk or worsted weight yarn 100-140 m/50 gr 2 colors dark color 1 and light color 2 for the samples is used drops lima circular needles 60 or 80 cm size 3 mm or dpn size 3 mm needle scisors stitch markers toy stuffing gauge 23 sts*30 row in 10*10 cm you don´t need to meet the gauge but a difference in gauges will cause a difference in sizes of the finished item glossary st - stitch sts - stitches k - knit round - round techniques k2tog knit two sts together - insert the right needle into two sts at the same time and knit ssk slip slip knit - slip the first st as if to knit then slip the next st as if to knit insert the left needle into the front of both slipped stitches and knit them together the pattern is for 2 sizes of mountains the bigger mountain is 10 cm high the smaller is 7 cm high the mountains are knitted in the round starting from the bottom up the decreases are made along the side sts in every 3rd round the charts for a colowork are below @thiscosynest 2 smaller mountain on the circular needles for magic loop technique or dpn cast on 38 sts with color 1 yarn leaving a long tail for sewing the bottom join the knitting in the round divide sts evenly onto 2 needles 19 sts on each work 2 rnds in stockinette st all k sts highlight the first and 20th sts first sts on each needle with markers from both sides 3rd round *k1 ssk k sts till there are 2 sts left to a marker k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 4-5th rnds all k sts repeat rnds 3-5 for 2 more times on the needles 26 sts 13 sts on each needle 12th round *k1 ssk k8 k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round join color 2 thread and work 2 rnds of colorwork according to chart 1 after the colorwork cut color 1 and continue working only in color 2 yarn 15th round *k1 ssk k sts till there are 2 sts left to a marker k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 16-17th rnds all k sts repeat rnds 15-17th for 1 more time 21st round *k1 ssk k1 k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 22nd round *k2tog* - to the end of the round there are 5 sts on the needles cut the yarn and pull it through the remaining open sts slightly stuff the mountain and sew the bottom with the mattress st the side sts should stay exactly on the sides chart 1 @thiscosynest 3 bigger mountain on the circular needles for magic loop technique or dpn cast on 50 sts with color 1 yarn leaving a long tail for sewing the
